title: Accessible Web Development
description: A modern website built for mobile, performance, and accessibility best practices. Great for small businesses and first-time websites.
cta: Includes mobile-first layout, basic SEO setup, and accessibility best practices.

title: Accessibility Audit & Fixes
description: A focused accessibility review with prioritized fixes to improve usability for everyone (and reduce risk).
cta: You’ll get a clear issues list + recommended fixes (and I can implement them).

title: SEO Audit & Optimization
description: Technical audit + keyword direction + on-page improvements that help you get found by the right people.
cta: Best for businesses that want more traffic without ads.

title: UX Improvements
description: Improve clarity and conversions: layout, messaging, CTAs, and user flow updates based on best practices.
cta: Ideal when you’re getting traffic but not getting leads.

title: Excel Analytics & Automation
description: Dashboards, cleanup, forecasting, and automation to save time and make better decisions from your data.
cta: Perfect for sales, finance, marketing, and operations tracking.

title: Portfolio / Personal Site
description: A clean, professional portfolio site designed to convert recruiters and clients.
cta: Fast, modern, and easy to update.

title: Maintenance & Support
description: Ongoing updates, small edits, performance checks, and support so your site stays healthy.
cta: Great if you want a site you don’t have to babysit.
